system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.53RM572RAaaWLZqq]{Simple Weapon Specialist (Light Club, Medium Club or Heavy Club)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.uR1tAu3dJH914reS]{Blunt Specialist}

Benefits

When wielding the hammer chosen from the Simple Weapon Specialist feat, the Critical Threat range is 13-18.
